lists.name: netsamurai-offsets
lists.desc: Primary NetSamurai list that indicates the specific fragments of code to be removed in real time to avoid tracking and fingerprinting.

lists.name: netsamurai-paywalls
lists.desc: Supplementary NetSamurai list that removes paywalls for some of the most widely used domains in the region.

lists.name: netsamurai-unbreak
lists.desc: Supplementary NetSamurai list that indicates cases in which the resources must not be modified, to avoid breaking functionality. To be removed in newer versions.

lists.name: easylist
lists.desc: Primary filter list that removes most adverts from international webpages, including unwanted frames, images and objects. The EasyList authors (https://easylist.to/).

lists.name: easyprivacy
lists.desc: Optional supplementary filter list that completely removes all forms of tracking from the internet, including web bugs, tracking scripts and information collectors. The EasyList authors (https://easylist.to/).
